<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// AArch64 always uses external relocations. If there is no symbol to use as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a base address (a local symbol with no preceding non-local symbol),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// error out.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
